text.section:
Sec. 31-301. Applicability.
All general requirements contained in this article are applicable to chauffeur applicants and chauffeurs for nonemergency medical transportation regulated under, Article III, private school buses regulated under, Section 371 and 372, taxicabs regulated under, Article II, Passenger Motor Carriers regulated under, Article III, and special transportation service regulated under, Article IV and limousines regulated under, Article VI.
